methods: abstract boolean hasProtocolVersion(CharArrayBuffer buffer, ParserCursor cursor) Checks whether there likely is a protocol version in a line.
abstract Header parseHeader(CharArrayBuffer buffer) Creates a header from a line.
abstract ProtocolVersion parseProtocolVersion(CharArrayBuffer buffer, ParserCursor cursor) Parses the textual representation of a protocol version.
abstract RequestLine parseRequestLine(CharArrayBuffer buffer, ParserCursor cursor) Parses a request line.
abstract StatusLine parseStatusLine(CharArrayBuffer buffer, ParserCursor cursor) Parses a status line.
